ComicInfo.Title: Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: Blood Legacy: The Story of Ryan
ComicInfo.Summary: The story of Ryan continues, as Dr. Susan Ryerson makes a few startling discoveries about the mysterious woman who has entered her life. Not all of her findings are good though as she learns that her life is now in mortal danger. Will this mysterious woman that she fears be her savior or her death?! Also, more light is shed on Ryan, as we continue to explore parts of her childhood and the link in which she holds to a dark past.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 19:04:36. [CVDB152026]
ComicInfo.Inker: Edwin Rosell, Marlo Alquiza, Richard Bonk, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andy Park, Jon Sibal, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.Characters: Edward, Ryan, Susan Ryerson, Victor Alexander
